alert.note: Alert for Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:24PM CDT until June 10 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Smith County in central Mississippi... Eastern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1224 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pelahatchie to near Rockport, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Forest around 1245 PM CDT. Homewood around 1250 PM CDT. Pineville around 105 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Sylvarena, Polkville, Mize, Lake and Sebastopol. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
